Dear Riot, I had bought Championship Shyvana and the ward skin immediately as soon as I came on league today, but in my haste I didn't realize there was a bundle that would make the two cheaper. Can I get compensation for buying the two separately; if I had known I would've bought the bundle instead.
make a support ticket. they will refund you the difference
Sweet. How long until we have the bundle with all 3 championship skins now!
